1330990.name: Bacuri
1330990.description:
One day a traveling cook found a newborn child eating inside a special fruit called Bacuri. The years have passed and a cheerful and partying young man travels with his cook uncle in search of new flavors. Today they arrived in the unknown realm of Ákañã and it seems that they smelled new flavors.
Discover Ákañã's interconnected surreal kingdom plunging into a young man's journey. Bacuri is a classic 2D action adventure where a boy discover himself, friends, habilities, lands, challenges and enemies. Draft your own path in this platformer crafted in modern pixel art style.

Game Characteristics:

- Classic screen scrolling action with all the modern improvements.

- Well-adjusted 2D controls. Dodge, attack and strike while facing challenges.

-Explore an interconnected world of forests and caves.

Forge your way! The Kingdom of Ákañã is expansive and open. Choose which paths to take, which friend to help.

-Evolve with new powerful skills! Climb the mountains, jump to new heights, glide and dart ahead in a swift flutter of hummingbird wings. Play your flute to enchant the forest and use darts with it to tame angry entities.

- When playing your flute, play a mini game in the best "Guittar Hero" style.

- Collect the local fruit in search of your fruit so loved by Bacuri.

- A cast of cute and scary characters revived in traditional pixel art animations frame by frame.

- Beautiful animated landscapes with parallax gives a depth of depth to a parallel world.

- Track inspired by Brazilian rhythms accompanies the player on his adventure. The music echoes the joy and sadness of a threatened and hopeful civilization.
